snippet: Anze Kopitar, who has scored 25 goals or more in each of the last five seasons, has had a breakout postseason after playing in relative obscurity in Los Angeles for six seasons.
abstract: Los Angeles Kings center Anze Kopitar, who has scored 25 goals or more in each of the last five seasons, has had a breakout postseason after playing in relative obscurity with the Kings for six seasons.
lead_paragraph: Anze Kopitar, who has scored 25 goals or more in each of the last five seasons, has had a breakout postseason after playing in relative obscurity in Los Angeles for six seasons.

headline.seo: In Playoffs, Kings’ Kopitar Draws New Attention
headline.main: Goals Keep Coming for the Kings’ Kopitar, Accompanied by New Attention
headline.print_headline: Goals Keep Coming for the Kings’ Kopitar, Accompanied by New Attention
